results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ይህም (ጊዜ) ያ ቀን አስቸጋሪ ቀን ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: አንድ ኾኖ ከፈጠርኩት ሰው ጋር ተዎኝ (እኔ እበቃሃለሁ)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ለእርሱም (ኑሮውን) መዘርጋትን የዘረጋሁለት (ከኾነ ሰው ገር ተዎኝ)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
